articles.author: Bill Hutchinson, Daphne Tolis
articles.title: Body of American tourist found on scenic Greek island, latest in a string of missing or dead foreigners - ABC News
articles.description: Five foreign tourists on the Greek islands are now missing or dead.
articles.content: An American tourist was found dead Sunday on a beach on the Greek Island of Mathraki, the latest in a series of foreign tourists found dead or reported missing in the scenic vacation paradise in the … [+2866 chars]
